## RHESSysIOinR Input Functions

This vignette shows example uses of the IOin_X functions, which serve to construct input data objects used to run one or many RHESSys simulations.

New/renamed input functions:

 * IOin_rhessys_input
 * IOin_tec_std
 * IOin_std_pars
 * IOin_hdr
 * IOin_clim

### IOin_rhessys_input

```{r eval=FALSE}

IOin_rhessys_input(
  version,
  tec_file,
  world_file,
  world_hdr_prefix,
  flowtable,
  start,
  end,
  output_folder,
  output_prefix,
  commandline_options
)




```
